I can see myself shelling out for a new 27" display and an xbox before GTA V comes out.

Thanks Apple for continually refusing to make it possible to use this really expensive imac with the beautiful display as an actual display.

Signed up just to post a HUGE Thanks to the uploader.

I'm on a 21.5 iMac 10.6.8 from about 3.5 years ago and this thing plays wonderfully. It's a little choppy to start with. But give it 3-5 minutes and it plays great. It's like it has to warm up a bit first.

I'm on the 4th Act of the story with most of the side stuff finished and there have been no real issues at all. It's crashed twice (though opened probably 50) but thats it. The only thing it can't do seamlessly is play the TV, but who cares about that :)
